arts.ttl: Ex-Chelsea star scores stunning goal for Atletico Madrid - but Diego Simeone's men lose more ground in LaLiga title race after being held to 1-1 draw
arts.sum: Diego Simeone 's side let a one-goal lead over their 15th-placed opponents slip, meaning they failed to close in on Barcelona at the top of LaLiga , who play their game in hand against Girona on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News: Gunners hope top target Joan Garcia gets relegated
arts.sum: Arsenal have been left hoping that top goalkeeper target Joan Garcia suffers relegation as it would result in a significant reduction to his release clause, according to Spanish media. Espanyol have already conceded that they will likely have to sell Garcia to balance the books this summer and they will be open to negotiating a price that is lower than his release clause.

arts.ttl: Simeone refuses to rule Atlético out of the title race after Espanyol draw
arts.sum: When asked if a title challenge was over, Simeone responded that, “I always say that the league is defined in the last five games, and those teams in the positions in the last rounds will fight for the title. “We can separate from that situation, we were able to make a good Champions League run, we competed well, we won the match, UEFA decided the result, but we won our match and we were eliminated and it was not a blow, because it was very clear what happened.

arts.ttl: Atletico stumbles again in La Liga after draw at Espanyol
arts.sum: The stalemate left Diego Simeone’s side six points behind leader Barcelona and three behind Real Madrid before both play games this weekend. Atletico entered the match following back-to-back La Liga losses to Getafe and Barcelona, interspersed with two losses to Madrid in the Champions League round of 16.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone still hurting from Champions League elimination ahead of Espanyol fixture in La Liga
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the press ahead of Saturday’s return to club-level action in La Liga against Espanyol, as he admitted that he is still hurting from the defeats to Real Madrid and FC Barcelona before the international break. He is a coach within a group of players, with the ability to see a lot of things about the team, the group, the situation we are going through all season.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone outlines which La Liga games will decide title race
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone has offered a hint at his La Liga title strategy as the campaign restarts this weekend. Los Rojiblancos signed off for the international break with a double blow of frustration as Real Madrid controversially eliminated them from the UEFA Champions League. That setback allowed Simeone to rally his team against […] The post Diego Simeone outlines which La Liga games will decide title race appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Arsenal monitor Atletico Madrid talent Adrian Nino
arts.sum: Arsenal are keeping close tabs on Atletico Madrid’s highly-rated young forward Adrian Nino, FootballTransfers understands. The 20-year-old, who has been turning heads in Atleti’s B-team, is regarded as a bright attacking prospect in Spain - and with new sporting director Andrea Berta set to get to work at the Emirates, his links to the Madrid giants could make this a transfer to watch.
All 20 LaLiga teams are in action this weekend with four matches on Saturday, five on Sunday and a Monday night game, and Phil Agius previews all 10 fixtures.

arts.ttl: Sources: Griezmann to delay Atleti exit for MLS
arts.sum: Antoine Griezmann is likely to stay at Atlético Madrid next season, sources have told ESPN, despite his longstanding interest in playing in MLS.

Espanyol are on an incredible run of form on their own turf considering their league position. Manolo Gonzalez's side are unbeaten in their last eight league games at home, including a win over Real M...
